Package: com.android.builder.core

[Java] Class BuildToolServiceLoader

    • com.android.builder.core.BuildToolsServiceLoader.BuildToolServiceLoader

    • build-tools version specific ServiceLoader helper.

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          ServiceLoader<T> getServiceLoader(Service<T> serviceType)
          Returns a newly allocated or existing ServiceLoader instance for the passed com.android.builder.core.BuildToolsServiceLoader.Service type in the context of the build-tools version this instance was created for.
          com.google.common.base.Optional<T> getSingleService(com.android.utils.ILogger logger, Service<T> serviceType)
          Return the first service instance for the requested service type or com.google.common.base.Optional#absent() if none exist.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public ServiceLoader<T> getServiceLoader(Service<T> serviceType)

          Returns a newly allocated or existing ServiceLoader instance for the passed com.android.builder.core.BuildToolsServiceLoader.Service type in the context of the build-tools version this instance was created for.

          throws:
          ClassNotFoundException
          Parameters:
          serviceType - the requested service type encapsulation.
          - the type of service
          Returns:
          a ServiceLoader instance for the T service type.

        • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public com.google.common.base.Optional<T> getSingleService(com.android.utils.ILogger logger, Service<T> serviceType)

          Return the first service instance for the requested service type or com.google.common.base.Optional#absent() if none exist.

          throws:
          ClassNotFoundException
          Parameters:
          logger - to log resolution.
          serviceType - the requested service type encapsulation.
          - the requested service class type.
          Returns:
          the instance of T or null of none exist in this context.
